title: Gracie's Nose
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 30 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: Gracie is a curious dog, and she uses her nose to explore the world. Come with her as she sniffs a variety of objects on a sunny day. The adorable story line, along with a repetitive sentence structure and attractive pictures, makes this a great choice for early emergent readers.
reviewWords: birds, bugs, busy, ear, lunch, roses, sniffs, toes
phonics: Consonants : Associate the letter Bb with the /b/ sound
grammar: Simple Sentences                : Recognize and construct simple sentences
